column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bavette's is hands down my favorite restaurant in Chicago right now. Everything from the service to decor to menu is top notch. I'm a huge fan of the 20s inspired ambiance
column2: so that's a huge plus for me. It's a very intimate setting
column3: perfect for a date. I ordered the pork chop
column4: which practically melted in my mouth with every bite. My boyfriend ordered the ribeye
column5: which was also amazing. He ordered it with the bone marrow
column6: which I wasn't a huge fan of
column7: but I'm generally not a fan of bone marrow. The service was excellent
column9: and the experience was overall excellent. I cannot wait to go back.
